sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_nnemc0_gwbs"> <x_snc_nnemc0_gwbs action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <definition>The initial training services used to establish and facilitate initial instruction of personnel to operate and maintain the system with maximum efficiency directly associated with a Prime Mission Product. It includes the development of training courses for installation, formal schoolhouse training, and initial/contractor training services. This does not include installation training included in 3.4.3, Training & Manning (after IOC) included with 4.6.2.</definition> <number>GWBS0001413</number> <parent_task display_value="3.9 Initial Training (Train the Trainer)">e7158176db91a3008e9357935e96199d</parent_task> <sys_class_name>x_snc_nnemc0_gwbs</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>jnyika</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-10-25 15:59:55</sys_created_on> <sys_id>63158176db91a3008e9357935e96199e</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>jnyika</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-10-25 16:51:00</sys_updated_on> <task_code>3.9.2</task_code> <task_name>3.9.2 Initial Training Services</task_name> <task_title>Initial Training Services</task_title> </x_snc_nnemc0_gwbs> </record_update>
